title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 215.3 - Filing of rules, regulations, orders and determinations issued by local agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 215.3 - Filing of rules, regulations, orders and determinations issued by local agencies

State Regulations
A copy of every rule, regulation, order and determination
that has been adopted or issued by a local agency of a government which the
board has determined is substantially equivalent to the provisions and
procedures set forth in the act and this Chapter, shall be filed with the board
within 15 working days after adoption or issuance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
215.3

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
